QuestData.Title: Sanctum Upgrade: Mirror Network
QuestData.Description:
Right. So, we got a Scroll of Dark Empowerment ready for youz that should manifest 'em mirror frames for you. Pre'y standard work.
Thing is, after you going to need a proper mirror maker to get 'em up an' workin'.
Prince Renathal might know a fang with the right skills. Best speak with him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Scroll of Dark Empowerment to conjure a Mirror Network.
QuestData.RewardText:
A network of mirrors to translocate throughout the realm will prove invaluable.
Rumor suggests of the former mirror maker of the Master was lost in the Ember Ward rather recently.
You have proven to have a talent for convincing people to join our side.
